answers.text: Here Smith.;There has been another crime at James Stuart's house,;in 72 Newman Street. I've been investigating; Jess Brown's life and I found out;that this guy is...;well, was her lover.;The body I found seems to be Stuart's.

questions.text: What!?;Come on, hurry up, this case is getting out of hands.;We need to solve it as soon as possible.;If not, everything will be shown in media and this;will be the end of my career.;And you'll stay in prison the rest of your life,;as it was supposed to be.
